page.title: 13CHILDHOOD IN BOLDRE
page.content: Comments by Elanor,aged 10. I like living in Boldre because of the lovely peaceful countryside and all the baby animals in the Spring.There are lots of lovely trees and places to play and to learn to ride horses. Some of the disadvantages are that none of my friends live near me and school is quite a long way away.There is not a lot of public transport so I have to ride my bike.I don't like riding in the rain,but if it snows and school is closed "Good-O" Apart from going to school I sing in the Church Chior <but don't like going to practise>. I go to Brownies and enjoy it a lot. Near the Hall there is a lovely Recreation Ground for us to play in, it has swings and a slide.
